Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>Now I can make the Boulder Breaker!


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Um...<sp:5:0:0> I'm sorry to say it, but you don't
seem to have the <clr:0000>cobble crusher <clr:ffff>or
enough <clr:0000>diamonds<clr:ffff>.
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Runaway_00>Master, please... <sp:5:0:0>Please give me one more
chance to make the <clr:0000>Boulder Breaker<clr:ffff>.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>Now I can make the Boulder Breaker!<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Um...<sp:5:0:0> I'm sorry to say it, but you don't
seem to have enough <clr:0000>flint<clr:ffff>.
Talk_51:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Happy_00>I was tryin' to be optimistic about the
materials for the Boulder Breaker...

I need a cobble crusher, five flint pieces,
and three diamonds.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Without any money, I have no idea how
I'll come up with the materials...
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>Now I can make the Boulder Breaker!<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Um...<sp:5:1:0> I'm sorry to say it, but you don't
have the <clr:0000>diamonds<clr:ffff>.
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>Now I can make the Boulder Breaker!<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Um...<sp:5:0:0> I'm sorry to say it, but you don't
have a <clr:0000>cobble crusher <clr:ffff>or enough <clr:0000>flint<clr:ffff>...
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Notice_00>Eh, customer? <sp:5:0:0>Sorry, bub. I'm a smithy,
not a shopkeeper.

<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:ffff>My focus is on the <clr:0000>Boulder Breaker <clr:ffff>right
now. The art of crafting such a beaut has
been passed down through the ages.
Only a chosen few can make it. It's a
historical weapon, and making it is an
absolute honor.
Here I thought I'd be teachin' my
apprentice, Fugo, to make it.

<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>But the fool's obsessed with that<sp:5:0:0>
<clr:0000>marbled rock roast <clr:ffff>stuff. It's all he
cares about anymore.
I told him to shove off right in the middle
of work.

I'm done with him!
Talk_52:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>What! <sp:5:0:0>You'll just GIVE them to me?


<sp:3:0:2:0801>Thank you! I was at a total loss—this is a
huge help!
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>Now I can make the Boulder Breaker!<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Um...<sp:5:0:0> I'm sorry to say it, but you don't
seem to have enough <clr:0000>diamonds <clr:ffff>or <clr:0000>flint<clr:ffff>.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Greeting_01>Eh? <sp:5:0:0>Didn't you already ask me that, bub?
Maybe I'm imaginin' things...

<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:ffff>My focus is on the <clr:0000>Boulder Breaker<clr:ffff>. It's a
historical weapon—the art of crafting it
has been passed down for generations.
Only a chosen few can make it. I was
gonna teach it to my apprentice, Fugo.

<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>But the fool's so obsessed with that
<clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff> stuff,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>he just up 'n'
walked out in the middle of work.
I'm done with him!
Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Notice_01>Huh? What? Sorry, but this is a forge,
not a shop.

Anyway, I'm kinda in the middle of
somethin' at the moment.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>To think, I went and chose that fool to
carry on the ancient art of crafting the
<clr:0000>Boulder Breaker<clr:ffff>...
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0901><clr:ffff>'Fore I knew it, he ran off and got all
googly-eyed for some stuff called
<clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
I'm done with him!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Well, <snd:TalkPositive_01>you've got yer enthusiasm,<sp:5:0:0> and
that counts for somethin'. But without
materials, how do you intend to do this?
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You'll need a cobble crusher, five
pieces of flint, and three diamonds
to complete it.
<sp:3:0:2:0901>Since you spent all our material funds
on marbled rock roast, we're dried up!
We don't have money OR materials.
Talk_56:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>I've never met a Hylian who was that
interested in the Boulder Breaker before.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><clr:0000><snd:Angry_01><clr:ffff>Maybe there's someone generous enough
to share those materials in exchange for
the <clr:0000>Boulder Breaker<clr:ffff>.
But that person probably doesn't exist.
Talk_57:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>Now I can make the Boulder Breaker
for<sp:5:0:0> you...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0401>Uh, is there...something stuck to this
<clr:0000>cobble crusher<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Well, shoot.


If it's anything other than just a pure
cobble crusher, I can't use it as
a material.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>If you're willing to provide it, then I'd gift
ya with a bona fide <clr:0000>Boulder Breaker<clr:ffff>.

So, yeah, please, bring me a pure cobble
crusher without anything attached to it.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00><clr:ffff>The <clr:0000>Boulder Breaker <clr:ffff>is a historic weapon.
The art of craftin' it is passed down
through generations.
Only a chosen few can make it. I was
gonna teach it to my apprentice, Fugo.

<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>But the fool was so obsessed with that
<clr:0000>marbled rock roast <clr:ffff>that he up 'n' walked
out in the middle of work.
Then he took the material funds and
wasted it for more'a that rock.

Now there's no way to get the three
diamonds, the cobble crusher, and the
five flint pieces we needed...
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Starting today, you'll be standing where
I've stood for many a year.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry_00>Gimme a break... That Hylian blondie had
me makin' the weirdest stuff.
Talk_59:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can't help you with that, but in Tarrey
Town out east from here, there's a shop
called Break-a-Part.<sp:0:4:0>They might be able to <clr:0000>break down <clr:ffff>the
stuff you've got fused to that.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>She said it was a simple mask, but it
looked funny to me. And she had me
make it with an odd material...
<sp:3:0:2:0301>At the time, my apprentice, Fugo, kept
sayin' he wanted to be a smithy like me.

But now, all he talks about is <clr:0000>marbled
rock roast<clr:ffff>. He won't so much as show
his face round here anymore.
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>Dagnabbit. And it was finally time for me
to pass along the secret of our trade—
how to make the <clr:0000>Boulder Breaker<clr:ffff>.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>Now I can make the Boulder Breaker!<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Um.<sp:5:1:0> I'm sorry to say this...


But you don't seem to have the cobble
crusher, flint, or the diamonds...
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>And you! You helped too! Without the
materials, I'd never have been able to
do this.<sp:5:0:0>
As thanks, I'd like for you to have this
<clr:0000>Boulder Breaker<clr:ffff>.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:SurpriseS_01>Confound that Hylian blondie! Forcing me
to make somethin' so stupid.

Meanwhile, my apprentice, Fugo, is
obsessin' over <clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff> and
can't be bothered to come help out.
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Think_00>Dagnabbit, it was just about time to pass
on the art of the <clr:0000>Boulder Breaker<clr:ffff> too.
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Understand_00>My customers are my top priority!


That means you should come back here if
it breaks on ya. I'll need materials, but I'll
make it again just as good as before!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Runaway_01>Master Rohan!<sp:5:0:0> Please let me try making
the <clr:0000>Boulder Breaker <clr:ffff>again!
Talk_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease_01>Now that Fugo has matured into a skilled
craftsman, I can take some rest.

The Boulder Breaker is the strongest
weapon passed down among Gorons.<sp:5:0:0>
It'll prove useful.
If it ever breaks, you can come back
and get Fugo to make ya another.
Talk_04: <sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>Hey, bub! Keep yer hands offa that!
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>When marbled rock roasts were on the
scene, I was worried what might happen...

But now that Fugo is back, I feel relieved.
I can leave the craft of <clr:0000>Boulder Breakers<clr:ffff>
to Fugo, and I can finally rest.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>Hey, Fugo! Get this guy out of here!


<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh, that's right. He's not here now.


<sp:3:0:2:0201>Anyway, that hunka junk is still a work in
progress. <sp:5:0:0>It's fragile, so don't touch it!
Talk_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>Fugo came here to start working when he
was just a wee pebble.

I didn't think he'd be there yet, but he
can already make the <clr:0000>Boulder Breaker<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>As his teacher, it makes me proud.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:SurpriseM_01>Listen up—that hunka junk is still a work
in progress. It's fragile, so hands off!
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><clr:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00><clr:ffff>If he can make the <clr:0000>Boulder Breaker<clr:ffff>, then
there's nothing left for me to teach.

Looks like I can kick back and begin livin'
my hermit life without a care in the world.

<sp:3:0:2:0501>First off, I'll head to Goron Hot Springs...
Nah, maybe I'll try out that new
Mine-Cart Land to the south...
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>The hermit life's the life for me!
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>You've got some gall, kid. After you up 'n'
left the workshop in the middle of training
fer some <clr:0000>marbled rock roast <clr:ffff>whatsit!
I'm done with you!
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>I've got no excuses...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0201>But I still need to put the finishing
touches on that Boulder Breaker! <sp:5:0:0>First,
let me prove myself, please.
If it's still no good, then you can be done
with me.
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>You... <sp:5:0:0>You really have it all?!


<sp:3:0:2:0801>Wah!<sp:5:0:0> Thank you! Now I can make a good
'n' proper Boulder Breaker!
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_01>Now I can make the Boulder Breaker!


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Um...<sp:5:1:0> I'm sorry to say it, but you don't
seem to have the <clr:0000>cobble crusher<clr:ffff>.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>Master Rohan! Watch me do this!


I'm gonna complete the Boulder Breaker,
and it's gonna be perfect!
Talk_33: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:WorkHeavy_00>I'll put my heart into it—pound it into life!
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_00>Hm...


<sp:3:0:2:0201>Mm-hmm. I don't even need to touch it
to know.
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>I get it. <sp:5:0:0>The materials aren't easy to
come by.

But if someone WERE to come by them,
and that someone handed 'em off to me...

Well, they'd be lookin' at a shiny, new
<clr:0000>Boulder Breaker <clr:ffff>for themselves.
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>That rocky luster. That well-crafted
handle. That blunt yet sturdy edge.

You've done good, Fugo.<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>I've seen many a Boulder Breaker in my
time, but this? This is one of the finest.
Talk_20: <sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:SurpriseM_01>Hey, bub! Keep yer hands offa that!
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:SurpriseL_01>Thank you so much, Master! I've never
gotten praise from you before.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>That's a custom-made product called
the <clr:0000>Boulder Breaker<clr:ffff>—<sp:5:0:0>a historic weapon
that is venerated among us Gorons.
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Work_00>But currently it's nothin' more than a
hunka junk till it's completed. It's fragile,
so don't touch it!
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>You had yer head on crooked for a while,
but you seem up to snuff now.

Looks like there's nothin' left I can teach
you. From here on out, this forge is yours.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Work_01>I'm warning you. Hands off the
<clr:0000>Boulder Breaker<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But if ya bring me the materials I need to
complete it, I might let ya have it.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:SurpriseL_00>Master Rohan!<sp:5:0:0>


What if I have the cobble crusher,
the flint, and the diamonds needed for
the <clr:0000>Boulder Breaker<clr:ffff>?
Then will you allow me to make it?
Talk_25: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you've got the means, then show me.
